column4: # {{non-gloss definition|Diminutive suffix, used to derive a noun meaning something smaller or younger, or a small amount.}}
# {{context|auxiliary|lang=zu}} to know [[how]] to, to [[be able]] to
# {{context|transitive|lang=zu}} to [[call for]] (something), to [[order]] {{gloss|place an order for}}
# {{context|intransitive|lang=zu}} to be a [[man]], to act like a man

# It means "place of [[w:gold|gold]]" in [[w:isiZulu|isiZulu]], referring to the fact that 40 percent of the world's known gold reserves have been found in the area and many Zulu men went to work in the region on [[w:mine|mine]]s.
# {{context|intransitive|lang=zu}} to [[go on]], to keep going, to [[proceed]]
# [[first fruits]] of the season; a [[ceremony]] that marks the first fruits of the harvest
# [[traditional]] [[doctor]] or [[healer]]{{attention|zu|Does this sense belong under a separate header/etymology?}}
# {{context|transitive|lang=zu}} to [[scratch]], to [[cut]] open the skin of (by scratching)
# {{context|intransitive|lang=zu}} to [[stop]], to come to a [[standstill]], to [[halt]]
# {{non-gloss definition|Interrogative particle; indicates a yes-no question. Placed at the end of the sentence.}}
# {{context|+possessive suffix or noun without initial vowel|lang=zu}} [[wife]] of
# a [[person]] is a [[person]] through/because of (other) [[people]]; you are who you are because of how you relate to others around you
# {{context|transitive|lang=zu}} to [[understand]], to be able to [[make out]] (what someone says)
